result.reason: The recent switch to using '-pwfile' for password passing in PuttyBase.cs likely broke compatibility with older PuTTY versions (pre-0.81) that do not support this flag.
result.approach: Modify PuttyBase.cs to detect the PuTTY version (via PuttyTypeDetector) and fallback to the legacy '-pw' argument if the version does not support '-pwfile'.
